title: How Much Buffer Do We Need When Budgeting? (Hour 2)
description:
George Kamel & Ken Coleman discuss:

Paying off a home vs. starting a business,

Preparing to move out of your parents' house,

Why you should pay off your debt smallest to largest,

The danger of comparison.


Support Our Sponsor:

Zander Insurance

LegacyBox
